Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka aims for a clean sweep after winning the first two matches of the series.
Sri Lanka's captain for the match is Charith Asalanka, while Shai Hope leads the West Indies team.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The third ODI match between Sri Lanka and West Indies will be played on October 26, 2024, at Pallekele International Cricket Stadium.
The match will start at 2:30 PM IST, with the toss scheduled for 2:00 PM IST.
The match will be broadcasted on Sony Sports Network in India and live-streamed on Sony Liv and FanCode app and website.
